text: Enrico Verachi (born January 18, 1990 in Nuoro) is an Italian professional football player. Currently, he plays for Serie D club ASD Marina di Ragusa as a midfielder. ==Career== He made his Serie A debut for Cagliari Calcio on March 28, 2010 in a game against U.C. Sampdoria. ===ASD Marina di Ragusa=== In November 2019 it was confirmed, that 29-year old Verachi had joined Serie D club ASD Marina di Ragusa.Ufficiale: Marina di Ragusa, ecco Verachi!, tuttocampo.it, 8 November 2019 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:Serie C players Category:Serie D players Category:Cagliari Calcio players Category:San Marino Calcio players Category:U.S. Siracusa players Category:Como 1907 players Category:Savona F.B.C. players Category:S.S. title: Enrico Verachi
